alert.note: Alert for Christian; Dallas; Douglas; Laclede; Taney; Webster; Wright (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 2:31AM CST until February 27 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Dallas County in southwestern Missouri... Wright County in southwestern Missouri... Western Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... North central Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... Western Laclede County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 315 AM CST. * At 231 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Fair Grove to near Rogersville to 6 miles south of Sparta to Forsyth, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lebanon, Lake Taneycomo, Marshfield, Rogersville, Ava, Forsyth, Seymour, Merriam Woods, Sparta, Morgan, Mansfield, Rockaway Beach, Fordland, Conway, Norwood, Hartville, Niangua, Taneyville, Duncan and Diggins. This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 91 and 143. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Dallas; Douglas; Laclede; Taney; Webster; Wright
